attributes.action: Teachers to comply with Sections 406/407 of The Education Act 1996.
attributes.additional_details: There have been reports in the media that teachers are indoctrinating children with their own political views. Recently there have been a lot of anti Trump and anti Brexit opinions presented to children as though they were fact. This is wrong and particularly worrying.
attributes.background: Breach of this should be treated as gross misconduct.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to complain about a teacher here:

https://www.gov.uk/report-teacher-misconduct
